title: Sorting Built-in Types in Go | Challenge
description: The Go programming language provides a built-in package named sort that implements sorting for builtins and user-defined types. In this challenge, we will focus on sorting for builtins.

meta.title: Go Programming | Sorting Strings and Integers
meta.description: Learn how to use the built-in Go `sort` package to sort slices of strings and integers, with examples and requirements.
meta.keywords: Go programming, sorting, strings, integers, sort package

verify.name: Verify Sorted Strings and Integers Output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 在 Go 语言中对内置类型进行排序 | 挑战
i18n.description: Go 编程语言提供了一个名为 sort 的内置包，用于对内置类型和用户定义类型进行排序。在这个挑战中，我们将专注于对内置类型进行排序。

meta.title: Go 编程 | 对字符串和整数进行排序
meta.description: 学习如何使用 Go 语言内置的 `sort` 包对字符串和整数切片进行排序，并附有示例和要求。
meta.keywords: Go 编程, 排序, 字符串, 整数, sort 包
